subject: Re: Partnership opportunity for Simsonn
description_text:
Hello,
Just wanted to quickly follow up to see if you had a chance to consider my
proposal.
I’d love to show you a short outline of how I can bring in 5k+ daily
organic traffic and secure $5k+ in sales revenue for your business.

Would you like me to share a step-by-step breakdown?

On Mon, Sep 15, 2025, 12:10 PM Hadassah Store <hadassahdesign2@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Hello Simsonn,
> Your website looks incredible!
> I would love to share strategies that can boost your conversions. If I
> drive 5k+ daily organic traffic and secure $5k in sales revenue, this month
> of September would you agree to a 3% commission?
> Reply “yes” so that i can share more details with you.
>
